channel.title: [Delta 317] Changing ::Pickup to ::Item
channel.description: Where do I change it so that when I spawn an item I can type ::item 995 999999999 instead of ::pickup 995 999999999. Also where can I change my announcements? Like the sendmessage that comes up when players first open the server....

item.title: [Delta 317] Changing ::Pickup to ::Item
item.dc:creator: @Mutant138 Mutant138
item.description:
@Mutant138 wrote:

to change your ::pickup > ::item… simply go into commands.java press Ctrl+F and search from ‘pickup’ then change it to Item… save it and compile… to change your welcome message open up client.java and search for “welcome to” usually that’s what all servers start of as, then you can edit anything that looks like this sendMessage(“welcome to #”) NOTE: if your not a confident coder i recommend you only edit the text inside the speach marks
once you’ve finished with that save as and compile and your good to go

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] Changing ::Pickup to ::Item
item.dc:creator: @homerunhitta977 homerunhitta977
item.description:
@homerunhitta977 wrote:

xmonster:

ok for the second part, search something thats in the message when u login. ok to change to item were it says if (commandstartswith (“pickup”) change to (“item”)

I already know that… I want to know what file the announcements are located in.

Read full topic
